amendment.description: To amend provisions relating to the rental assistance program of the Rural Housing Service.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1023 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Smith to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6311) To amend provisions relating to the rental assistance program of the Rural Housing Service.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1023 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Smith to Amendment SA 948.
